title: Patch 7.19 Skins Unavailable
body: The patch hit about 12 hours ago at my place yet i still cant purchase the new skins.. when will they be available ive been eagerly waiting and havent slept all last night -_-

replies.body: New skins typically don't hit the shop until a couple days after the patch drops. Be sure to look for them tomorrow!
yeah, what is with rito and announcing things that they wont be avaliable at least for an entire month
I'm right there with you man!!  Don't they want my moneyyy!!
